citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 AM on
19APR2023.
The inspector arrived at 11:45 AM and tried to contact the licensee by knocking on the door, yelling hello outback, and
calling the phone number listed. The inspector left the facility at 12:30 PM.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 AM on 
19APR2023. 
The inspector arrived at 11:45 AM and tried to contact the licensee by knocking on the door, yelling hello outback, and 
calling the phone number listed.  The inspector left the facility at 12:30 PM. 
 
 
 
End Section
